errors.error_description: The command to install the Poetry dependency manager is incorrect. It installs 'poetry-core' instead of the full 'poetry' package, which includes the necessary command-line interface.
correction_candidates: Start by installing the poetry module using the command: `pip install poetry`
Start by installing the poetry module using the command: `pip install --user poetry`
Start by installing the poetry module using the command: `python -m pip install poetry`
Start by installing the poetry module using the command: `pipx install poetry`
errors.golden_answer: Start by installing the poetry module using the command: `pip install poetry`

In the same folder, enter the following command in the terminal: `poetry run python app.py`
In the same folder, enter the following command in the terminal: `poetry run python pulse.py`
